Vulnerability.Title: alsa-firmware bug fix and enhancement update
Vulnerability.Description:
An updated alsa-firmware package that fixes several bugs and adds various enhancements is now available for Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7. The alsa-firmware package contains firmware binaries for a number of sound cards. Note that some of the cards require firmware loaders provided by the alsa-tools-firmware package.
The alsa-firmware package has been upgraded to upstream version 1.0.28, which provides a number of bug fixes and enhancements over the previous version. (BZ#1112207)
Users of alsa-firmware are advised to upgrade to this updated package, which fixes these bugs and adds these enhancements.
Note for remediation: Please disable the SELinux for RHEL 4/5 when repairing, or some rpm packages will fail to install.
